metadata.synopsis: One liners for Gondian Worker06 (Genshu Ofran) after the player has visited the Iron Throne and has begun to liberate the gnomes in the Steel Foundry.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Load up CTY_Main_AOpen debug bookSet flag for haivng saved prisonersGo to -1937; 0; 443Kill enemeisdisarm all kill switches that join combatClick on Genshu Ofran

1.speaker: Gondian Genshu Ofran
1.text: I won't let any Banites pass me - I swear it.

2.speaker: Gondian Genshu Ofran
2.text: I was hoping for an army of Flaming Fist, but I'm not complaining. Keep going - there's more up ahead!

3.speaker: Gondian Genshu Ofran
3.text: I'll watch your back - go on!

4.speaker: Gondian Genshu Ofran
4.text: You took down the Iron Throne, didn't you? Did you see my sister?

0.speaker: Gondian Genshu Ofran
0.text: Never mind - there'll be time for that later. Keep going - we'll watch your back.
0.context: NodeContext: pulls himself back, trying to be practical but scared for his sister.
